title: Allure
subtitle: Allure
header: The landing page design and animation for a meaningful project campaign "See Yourself See Each Other" produced by Allure with Ulta Beauty.

content.header: A project breaking down beauty standards through open and honest conversations.
paragraphs: In See Yourself, See Each Other, the brand-new series produced by Allure with Ulta Beauty, the campaign kicks off important conversations on the topics including representation, skin acceptance, hair acceptance, gender identity, and body positivity.

content.header: No matter where you come from, who you love, or how you look, one thing is certain: Everyone deserves to be seen, heard, and respected.
paragraphs: Together with Allure and Ulta Beauty, I had a chance to get the dialogue rolling that beauty is for everyone to partake in as a source of enjoyment, an art form, a form of self-care, and an empowering tool that helps you be your best self.
